latitude.desc: A geographic coordinate that specifies the north-south position of a point on the Earth's surface

slope.desc: The inclination of a surface to the horizontal

heightNN.desc: Height (altitude, elevation) is the vertical distance between the land surface and mean sea level

windSpeedHeight.desc: Height above ground surface at which wind speed is measured

leachingDepth.desc: Depth below ground surface at which water and nutrients outflow is determined

NDeposition.desc: Annual deposition of nitrogen compounds with rainfall or dust

groundwaterDepthMin.desc: Minimum distance of the groundwater table to the ground surface during the year

groundwaterDepthMax.desc: Maximum distance of the groundwater table to the ground surface during the year

groundwaterDepthMinMonth.desc: Month in which the minimum distance of the groundwater table to the ground surface is commonly observed

Corg.desc: Organic carbon concentration in the soild phase of the soil horizon

textureClass.desc: Texture class according to the German Soil Survey Manual 5th ed.

sand.desc: Volume fraction of fine soil (< 2.0 mm particle diameter) occupied by sand (0.063 mm to 2.0 mm)

clay.desc: Volume fraction of fine soil (< 2.0 mm particle diameter) occupied by clay (< 2.0 μm particle diameter)

sceleton.desc: Volume fraction of total soil matrix occupied by stones (> 2.0 mm particle diameter)

fieldCapacity.desc: Maximum water content being held back against gravity

permanentWiltingPoint.desc: Water content below which crops start to wilt

pH.desc: pH value of the soil solution (CaCl2)

CN.desc: Carbon to nitrogen ratio of the soil organic matter

bulkDensity.desc: Bulk density of the soil volume
